### Chart B

```{r}
gs <- emajorDV::githubService()
gs$auth()-> token
gs$getProjects(token) -> projects

purrr::map_dfr(
  projects,
  ~.x[c("name","body")]
) %>%
  rename(
    'project'='name',
    'content'='body'
  ) %>%
  DT::datatable()
```
